filmJson.name: Eidoloscope
filmJson.developedBy: Eugene Augustin Lauste & Woodville Latham  (Lambda Company)
filmJson.fact1: This was the first device to use the Latham loop, a method that allowed film strips to move quickly and gently through a projector
filmJson.fact2: This device premiered in May of 1895, which is before the Lumière brothers debuted the Cinematograph
filmJson.fact3: This was likely the first widescreen film format, with an aspect ratio of 1.85:1
